message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a great price of $200. It's a steal you don't want to miss!
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $200 represents the value of this item, I'm willing to come down to $170 for you. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $170 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay up to $140 for the product. Can you meet me in the middle?
